description: The function is vulnerable to Path Traversal (CWE-22) as it uses user input to construct a file path without proper sanitization. An attacker could manipulate the 'path' variable to access arbitrary files on the system. Additionally, the function is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (CWE-79) as it directly uses user input in the 'handler.handler' function without proper sanitization or output encoding, allowing an attacker to inject malicious scripts.
